tool_description: Validates test results against age, gender, and condition-specific reference ranges to flag abnormal values.

result_unit.description: Unit of measurement for the result

patient_gender.description: Patient gender: male, female, or other

pregnancy_status.description: Whether patient is pregnant (affects reference ranges)

medication_list.description: List of current medications that may affect test results

error_messages: Unknown test code: Test code not found in reference range database.
Invalid result format: Result value must be numeric and unit must be recognized.
Age out of range: Patient age must be between 0 and 150 years.
Invalid gender: Gender must be specified as male, female, or other.
Unit mismatch: Result unit does not match expected unit for this test.
Reference range unavailable: No reference range available for this demographic combination.
usage: Provide test_code, result_value, result_unit, patient_age, and patient_gender. Include pregnancy_status and medication_list when relevant for accurate range interpretation.

range_status.description: Result interpretation: normal, abnormal_high, abnormal_low, or critical

reference_range_low.description: Lower bound of normal reference range

reference_range_high.description: Upper bound of normal reference range

clinical_significance.description: Brief clinical interpretation of the abnormal result
